TechInfo.Strategy: If you research Knowledge of the Arcane very early, you will gain some arcane secrets for free

TechInfo.Help: Being the first civilization to prove your devotion via researching this tech inspires your citizens to proclaim your capital the holy city.

TechInfo.Quote: Fear little my Enemies, for it is not you whom i come after. Those who oppose the true gods shall recieve their punishment

TechInfo.Help: Allows Recon Units to capture Animals
[ICON_BULLET]Requires six Buildings constructed by tamed Animals
[ICON_BULLET]Requires atleast one of each: Luxury District, Warehouse District and Foreign Trade District
[ICON_BULLET]Requires a Silk Trader and three Weaver Huts
